metadata.name: Heavy Wolframium Balls (Easter edition)
metadata.description:
Do you know the expression "- man with balls of steel"?
These people are resolute, courageous, strong-willed, with strong nerves, self-confident.
There are such men and women among traders, politicians, military, firefighters,
miners, and just in everyday life.
Often such people want to be rewarded with an appropriate award.
This is how was born the idea to create a series of collections.
Each collection will consist of seven "Heavy Metal Balls"
each of which has its own level of strength and value.

This copy of "Wolframium balls" (Easter edition)
- have the seventh level of durability.
These are the most durable balls in the collection.
When heated (especially in a vacuum environment) they are able to emit a bright light that will illuminate your path.
